title: Counterclaim Filed by First National Realty Partners
court: U.S. District Court for the District of New Jersey
summary: First National Realty Partners files counterclaim against investors, seeking to enforce their arbitration clause and compel arbitration. The counterclaim disputes the fraud allegations and seeks to move the dispute to arbitration as required by their investment agreements.
parties: Defendants/Counter-Plaintiffs: First National Realty Partners, LLC
